sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"跟随，追踪"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: pursue, follow, chase, hunt, trace, track, trail
means: pursue ： 指坚持不懈、毫不动摇地紧跟、追赶某人、某物或某个事业。
follow ： 普遍用词，含义最广，多指跟随起引导作用的人或物，跟随的动机可以是善意的，也可能是恶意的。
chase ： 指快速追赶或决心追踪，褒义贬义均可用。
hunt ： 原义为"追猎、猎取"，现用于指追捕或搜寻逃犯等。
trace ： 指根据线索或足迹进行跟踪。用于抽象意义时指找到某事物的根源。
track ： 指沿着人或动物留下的印迹或行迹追踪。

sentence.Network_en: There is another avenue to pursue — it involves further negotiations.
sentence.Network_cn: 还有一个办法可用，但需要进一步的磋商。

sentence.Network_en: She had come to England to pursue an acting career.
sentence.Network_cn: 她来英格兰投身演艺事业。

sentence.Network_en: Students may pursue research in any aspect of computational linguistics.
sentence.Network_cn: 学生可以就计算语言学的任何一个方面展开研究。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 务字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 谋求〖 seek〗 追求〖 pursue〗 事业;事务〖 affair;business〗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... obsequious a 谄媚的，奉承的 pursue v 追赶；追击 section n 切开；部门.
690个英语四级高频词汇 ... previous a. 先，前，以前的 222. pursue vt. 追逐；追求；从事，进行 224. stale a. 不新鲜的，陈腐的 225.
蹑_百度百科 ... 10、追随；追赶[ follow] [pursue] 追踪；追随在人后面 [lighten (one's step)] 放轻脚步走.

list.abs: 品牌中英名名称征集-品牌起名-猪八戒网 ... 105 秀润 Show embellish ( Pursue excellence 追求卓越） (Create better 创造美好）.
A psalm... ... Let us,then,be up and doing, 让我们起来干吧， Still achieving,still pursuing 不断胜利，不断追求， VOA 新闻.
北京考博英语辅导班讲义 - 豆丁网 ... 转变政府职能 transform 追求进步 pursue progress 追求真理 seek the truth.
Unit 11 Key to success (语言点) ... pursue the enemy 追击敌人 pursue pleasure 寻欢作乐 pursue a discussion 继续讨论.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally in the sense 'follow with enmity'): from Anglo-Norman French pursuer, from an alteration of Latin prosequi 'prosecute'

entry.def: If you pursue an activity, interest, or plan, you carry it out or follow it.

example.ex: It became harder for women married to diplomats to pursue their own interests...
example.tran: 与外交官结婚的女性要追求自己的爱好就变得更加困难了。

example.ex: He said Japan would continue to pursue the policies laid down at the London summit...
example.tran: 他说日本将继续贯彻伦敦峰会所制定的政策。

entry.def: If you pursue a particular aim or result, you make efforts to achieve it, often over a long period of time.

example.ex: The implication seems to be that it is impossible to pursue economic reform and democracy simultaneously...
example.tran: 言外之意似乎是经济改革和民主化进程是不可能同时进行的。

example.ex: Mr. Menendez has aggressively pursued new business.
example.tran: 梅嫩德斯先生积极开拓新业务。

entry.def: If you pursue a particular topic, you try to find out more about it by asking questions.

example.ex: If your original request is denied, don't be afraid to pursue the matter.
example.tran: 如果你最初的请求遭到拒绝，不要害怕，要继续追问下去。

entry.def: If you pursue a person, vehicle, or animal, you follow them, usually in order to catch them.

example.ex: She pursued the man who had stolen a woman's bag.
example.tran: 她追赶那个偷了一个妇女提包的男人。

means.word_mean: 1. carry out or participate in an activity; be involved in;
2. follow in or as if in pursuit;

sentences.sentence: "The police car pursued the suspected attacker"
"Her bad deed followed her and haunted her dreams all her life"

means.word_mean: 3. go in search of or hunt for;

sentences.sentence: "Can you act on this matter soon?"

auth_sentence.res_content: Social engineers instead pursue societal solutions that have appeal!

auth_sentence.content: Humans will pursue entertainment and culture or advancing science.
auth_sentence.res_content: Humans will pursue entertainment and culture or advancing science.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Humans will pursue entertainment and culture or advancing science.

stems_affixes.word_buile: suit[v.合适, 适合, 相配]+able……的→adj.适当的, 相配的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不适合的, 不相称的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+suitable[adj.适当的, 相配的]→adj.不适合的, 不相称的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 追赶, 追踪, 追击, 继续, 从事
stems_affixes.word_buile: pur+su跟随,追+e→v.追赶, 追踪, 追击, 继续, 从事

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合适, 适合, 相配
stems_affixes.word_buile: su跟随,追+it走→跟在后面走→相配

Sentence.sentence: Kodak's decision not to pursue the role of official film for the 1984 Los Angeles Olympics was a major miscalculation.
However, having free time to relax and pursue hobbies is important.
Why do some people pursue higher paying but demanding careers?

How can it be that societies like Sweden,where gender equality is vigorously pursued and enforced,have fewer female managers,executives,professionals,and business owners than eh laissez-faire(自由放任的)united states?
workers who bill or get paid by the hour, think employer and fast-food workers, report focusing more on pursuing more money than those who get paid by salary and the fact has been fast.
Compared with early generations we spend more and more time working and have less and less free time to engage in leisure pursues.

sentences.en: The policemen pursued the bank robbers.
Foxes, wild cats and other animals pursue the hare.
sentences.cn: 狐狸、野猫及其他一些动物都捕食野兔。

sentences.en: He began to pursue an easy and comfortable life.
sentences.cn: 他开始追求安逸舒适的生活。

means.word_mean: 继续; 从事, 经营

sentences.en: He pursued his studies after leaving school.
sentences.cn: 他离开学校后仍继续进行研究。

sentences.en: The country has always pursued a policy of peace.
sentences.cn: 该国一直奉行和平政策。

sentences.en: We will pursue the subject of discussion tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我们明天继续讨论这个题目。

sentences.en: We have decided not to pursue the matter any further.
sentences.cn: 我们决定不再追查那件事了。

sentences.en: to pursue after an escaped prisoner

jushi.english: His doctorate has been pursued in Oxford University.
jushi.chinese: 他的博士学位是在牛津大学完成的。

jushi.english: Daphne was pursued by Apollo and was at last changed into a laurel tree.
jushi.chinese: 达夫尼被阿波罗穷追不舍,最后被变成一棵桂树。

jushi.english: Foxes, wild cats and other animals pursue the hare.
jushi.chinese: 狐狸、野猫及其他一些动物都捕食野兔。
